actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to redesignate November 11 of each year as Veterans Day and to make such day a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Redesignates November 11 of each year as Veterans Day and makes such day a legal public holiday effective January 1, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to redesignate November 11 of each year as Veterans Day and to make such day a legal public holiday.
